item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 首次公开募股在冲突焦虑中下跌
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 公司周三在利雅得的首次交易中下跌，因为以色列和伊朗之间不断升级的冲突波及整个地区股市，并给航空股带来压力。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Flynas Co. fell in its Riyadh trading debut on Wednesday as the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran reverberates across regional equity markets and pressures airline stocks.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气连续第六天上涨，霍尔木兹运输成为焦点
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格连续第六天上涨，创下近四周来的最长连涨纪录，原因是以色列和伊朗之间的冲突引发了人们对能源贸易要道霍尔木兹海峡船舶运输的担忧。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains for a sixth day, the longest streak in almost four weeks, as the conflict between Israel and Iran raises concerns over vessel traffic via the Strait of Hormuz, a key energy trade route.】

item.title: Star Capital 考虑对国防科技公司 Vincorion 进行首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，随着投资者对欧洲航空航天和国防资产价值的提升，Star Capital 正在考虑对德国国防技术公司 Vincorion 进行首次公开募股。【原文：Star Capital is considering an initial public offering of German defense technology firm Vincorion, people familiar with the matter said, as rising investor interest lifts the value in European aerospace and defense assets.】

item.title: 德国市场走强，法国不受投资者青睐
item.description: 在欧洲风起云涌的这一年，有一个重要市场却没有得到投资者的青睐：法国。【原文：In a year that’s all about Europe, there’s one key market missing out on all the investor love: France.】

item.title: 印尼将传唤 BI 副主席作为贪污案证人：Technoz
item.description: 据当地新闻媒体 Technoz 周三报道，印尼反贪局已发函传唤印尼银行副行长菲利亚宁希-亨达塔（Filianingsih Hendarta），要求他在一起与社会项目有关的贪污案中作为证人接受讯问。【原文：Indonesia’s anti graft agency has sent a letter summoning Bank Indonesia Deputy Governor Filianingsih Hendarta for questioning as a witness in a graft case related to a social program, local news outlet Technoz reported on Wednesday.】

item.description: Blackstone 公司旗下的赌场运营商 Cirsa Enterprises 宣布了在西班牙首次公开募股的计划。【原文：Cirsa Enterprises, the casino operator owned by Blackstone Inc., announced plans for an initial public offering in Spain.】

item.title: 英国央行决议前英国通胀率维持在一年多以来最高水平
item.description: 英国通胀率保持在一年多以来的最高水平，在英国央行权衡能源市场动荡将在多大程度上影响其降息之路之际，物价压力依然强劲，令人不安。【原文：UK inflation remained at its highest level in more than a year, keeping price pressures uncomfortably strong as the Bank of England weighs how much energy market turmoil will affect its path to cutting interest rates.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，BBVA SA 正在就向包括 Cerberus Capital Management 西班牙分部和 One William Street Capital Fund 在内的基金出售总额约为 6.5 亿欧元（7.54 亿美元）的两个贷款组合进行深入谈判。【原文：BBVA SA is in advanced talks to sell two loan portfolios totaling around €650 million ($754 million) to funds including Cerberus Capital Management’s Spanish unit and One William Street Capital Fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莫迪反驳特朗普关于巴基斯坦停火的说法
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于在上个月的军事冲突中利用贸易协议与巴基斯坦达成停火协议的说法提出了质疑。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi disputed President Donald Trump’s claims that trade deals were used to clinch a ceasefire with Pakistan during last month’s military conflict.】

item.title: 中国 5 月稀土出口下滑，磁铁销售受到抑制
item.description: 中国稀土产品（包括目前与美国关系紧张的强力磁铁）的出口量在5月份跌至五年来的新低，原因是中国政府的出口限制措施扼杀了稀土产品的流动。【原文：China’s exports of rare earth products — including powerful magnets now at the heart of tensions with the US — slumped to a fresh five-year low in May as Beijing’s export curbs choked flows.】

item.title: 高盛、摩根大通押注强势法郎将抵消 SNB 0% 的利率水平
item.description: 华尔街最大的银行都在押注，瑞士法郎的坚挺和避风港吸引力将应对欧洲零利率的可能回归。【原文：Wall Street’s biggest banks are betting the Swiss franc’s strength and haven appeal will cope with the potential return of subzero interest rates in Europe.】

item.title: 伦敦的天价房价让租房者越来越少
item.description: 一家房产搜索网站的数据显示，在伦敦寻找租房的人数持续下滑，这表明高昂的房租让许多居民连这一微不足道的目标都望尘莫及。【原文：The number of people looking for a room to rent in London has continued to slide, data from a property search website show, in a sign that high rents are pushing even that modest goal out of reach for many residents.】

item.title: 英国央行警告美国关税和以色列伊朗危机带来通胀风险
item.description: 韩国央行表示，虽然韩国的通胀率已稳定在央行 2% 的目标附近，但美国关税和以色列-伊朗冲突给前景增添了不确定性。【原文：While South Korea’s inflation has stabilized near the central bank’s 2% target, US tariffs and the Israel-Iran conflict are adding uncertainty to the outlook, according to the Bank of Korea.】

item.title: 经历五年低迷后，JD.com 亿万富翁公布扭亏计划
item.description: JD.com Inc.创始人刘强东誓言加快进军海外市场的步伐，并在从食品配送到旅游等新领域与美团展开竞争，这是他为重振这家自2020年政府打压以来一直萎靡不振的在线零售商所做的最大胆的尝试。【原文：JD.com Inc. founder Richard Liu vowed to speed an overseas foray and compete with Meituan in new arenas from food delivery to travel, describing his boldest attempt yet to revive an online retailer that’s languished since a 2020 government crackdown.】

item.title: 美国加征关税前泰国出口创三年来最大增幅
item.description: 泰国的出口量创下了自 2022 年初以来的最大增幅，因为在特朗普政府计划征收的关税仍被搁置的情况下，企业急于囤积货物。【原文：Thailand’s exports surged the most since early 2022 as companies rushed to stockpile goods while the Trump administration’s planned tariffs are still on hold.】

item.title: 中国将提高投资者购买海外资产的额度
item.description: 中国将允许部分本地投资者将更多资金投入海外资产，这表明随着人民币汇率趋于稳定，中国政府正在开放金融市场。【原文：China will allow some local investors to put more of their money into overseas assets, a sign Beijing is opening up its financial market as the yuan steadies.】

item.title: 对冲基金交易员将其公司推向迪拜和阿布扎比
item.description:
对冲基金纷纷涌向阿联酋的原因是需要让明星交易员满意。到目前为止，该地区不断升级的冲突并没有阻止他们。【原文：

The rush of hedge funds heading to the UAE has been driven by the need to keep star traders happy. Escalating conflict in the region hasn’t deterred them so far.

item.title: EQT 创始人支持初创公司 Swebal，计划建造 TNT 工厂
item.description: 瑞典国防初创企业 Swebal 已从包括私募股权公司 EQT AB 联合创始人 Thomas von Koch 在内的投资者处筹集到 300 万欧元（350 万美元）资金，以帮助其建造一座生产爆炸材料 TNT 的工厂。【原文：Swedish defense startup Swebal has raised €3 million ($3.5 million) from investors including Thomas von Koch, the co-founder of private equity firm EQT AB, to help it construct a factory manufacturing the explosive material TNT.】

item.title: 中国钢铁市场疲软，铁矿石延续跌势
item.description: 随着中国钢铁市场的疲软，铁矿石连续第五天下跌，延续了下跌轨迹。【原文：Iron ore edged down for the fifth day, continuing a downward trajectory as China’s steel market weakens.】

item.title: 中国人民银行行长认为美元主导地位减弱将引发货币竞争
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜最清晰地阐述了他对全球货币新秩序未来的愿景，即在美元占据主导地位数十年后，一个更具竞争力的体系将在未来几年扎根。【原文：People’s Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng laid out in the clearest terms yet his vision for the future of a new global currency order after decades of dollar dominance, predicting a more competitive system will take root in the years to come.】

item.title: Switch 2》销售火爆，任天堂涨幅扩大至创纪录水平
item.description: 任天堂公司股价创下两个月来最大涨幅，创下新纪录，原因是投资者更加关注该公司强劲的销售增长，认为它可以抵御全球波动。【原文：Nintendo Co. shares rallied the most in two months to a fresh record as investors increased their focus on the firm’s strong sales growth as a shelter from global volatility.】

item.title: 资金短缺，中国汽车以旧换新补贴在部分地区停止发放
item.description: 由于资金短缺以及官员对 "零里程 "二手车盛行的审查，中国至少有六个省的重点城市暂停了为促进电动汽车和节油汽车销售而提供的以旧换新补贴。【原文：China’s trade-in subsidy to boost sales of electric and fuel-efficient vehicles has been suspended in key cities across at least six provinces as funds run short and officials scrutinize the prevalence of ‘zero-mileage’ used cars.】

item.description: 现在的石油期权比 2022 年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后更看涨，这表明以色列和伊朗的交锋令全球市场岌岌可危，人们猜测美国可能会加入攻击行列。【原文：Oil options are now more bullish than after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine in 2022, showing a global market that’s on edge as Israel and Iran trade blows, and speculation mounts that the US may join the attack.】
